description: Bridges: Type should be defined for param `isoCode` in method `Spryker\Zed\PriceProductVolumeGui\Dependency\Facade\PriceProductVolumeGuiToCurrencyFacadeBridge::fromIsoCode()`.

Bridges: The bridge interface has incorrect method signature for `fromIsoCode()`. Got `$isoCode` but expected to be `string $isoCode`. That violates the rule "All bridge interface methods must have exactly the same or more strict signature as their parent"
